alert.note: Alert for Cooper; Henry; Johnson; Pettis (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 3:06AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Henry, Pettis, Cooper and southeastern Johnson Counties through 400 AM CDT... At 306 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Smithton, or 7 miles east of Sedalia, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Sedalia Airport measured a 45 mph wind gust. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sedalia, Clinton, Windsor, Knob Noster, Whiteman Air Force Base, La Monte, Pilot Grove, Smithton, Leeton, Urich, Green Ridge, Calhoun, Otterville, Deepwater, Montrose, Bunceton, Chilhowee, Whiteman Afb, Prairie Home and Coal. This includes Interstate 70 in Missouri between mile markers 107 and 114. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
